pages.text: I've heard from many people that the size of their minimap takes up about half of the screen when first loading in. Unfortunatly, it seems like there isn't much I can do to prevent this; it really depends on your GUI scale and screen resolution.$(br2)You can do something about it though if you haven't already! Just press 'y' on your keyboard and there will be a
bunch of settings for you including the scale.
